crunchbase_info.name: Sandboxes

product.name: Sandboxes Website Builder
product.description: A no-code platform for creating fully responsive websites tailored for new products and startups.

crunchbase_info.headline: Sandboxes helps build website for a new product or startup.
crunchbase_info.description:
Sandboxes helps build website for a new product or startup.

The easiest way to understand the idea of sandboxes is to approach them as any server with a root access. Here you can see a list of sandboxes that mirror branches in your project. The sandboxes are generated automatically as soon as you create a new branch in your repository.

Every sandbox is a Linux container with the pre-installed components required to run your project. Clicking a sandbox brings up its control panel where you can define the components and the building process of your application. Everyone who's ever worked with builds in Buddy will immediately feel at home.

You can use your terminal to iterate with the sandbox just like with any other server, as well as browse and edit files directly in the GUI.

linkedin_info.description:
Product Hunt surfaces the best new products, every day. It's a place for product-loving enthusiasts to share and geek out about the latest mobile apps, websites, hardware projects, and tech creations. 

Community members can submit, browse, vote, and comment on daily submissions of products. They also get the opportunity to interact directly with product creators, investors, journalists, as well as, an active community of people who are passionate about products.

product.title: Blinkist
product.description: Key insights from 2,000+ bestselling nonfiction books

crunchbase_info.name: Blinkist

product.name: Blinkist App
product.description: An app providing summaries of key insights from over 7,500 nonfiction books and podcasts in text and audio formats, consumable in about 15 minutes.

product.name: Blinkist Guides
product.description: Expert-led step-by-step guides on key topics with interactive tools and activities to help users apply learned concepts.

product.name: Blinkist Spaces
product.description: A social learning feature allowing users to create, curate, and share collections of titles and notes with others or privately.

product.name: Blinkist AI Assistant
product.description: An AI-powered tool that summarizes videos, podcasts, documents, articles, and more, allowing users to upload content and receive instant summaries.

crunchbase_info.headline: Blinkist offers an app that allows its users to read the most important insights from non-fiction books in 15 minutes.
crunchbase_info.description:
Where do the worldâ€™s smartest people get their ideas? From great books. Blinkist distills the key insights of 2,500+ bestselling nonfiction books into powerful 15-minute reads or listens for your mobile device.

In 2017, Blinkist's app has been nominated by Apple as one of the best in the App Store. Blinkist has received the World Summit Award, granted by the United Nations, in the Learning & Education category, as well as a Google Material Design Award for Brand Expressiveness.

At Blinkist, we got rid of classical management hierarchies and, instead, distributed authority among all colleagues. Blinkist fosters a unique company culture championing self-empowerment, personal development, direct communication and mutual support.

Blinkist offers a fantastic workplace in the heart of Berlin-NeukÃ¶lln including all the benefits youâ€™d expect â€“ from a personalized perk system to free private language lessons. Add a competitive salary, a personal development budget of 1,500â‚¬ per year, flexible working hours, and a meaningful product on the rise, and you have a first impression of why Blinkist is a great place to work.

crunchbase_info.description:
Refresh finds common ground with the people you meet. It searches the web and social networks to deliver insights about your contacts: mutual interests, shared passions, and important moments. Refresh lays the foundation for better relationships and prepares you to connect in every meeting on your calendar. Itâ€™s all the research you need to be prepared but donâ€™t have time to do. 

Your relationships will be stronger when you make Refresh part of your day.

product.title: Readmill
product.description: A beautiful e-book reader for iPhone, iPad and Android

product_hunt.short_description: A beautiful e-book reader for iPhone, iPad and Android

crunchbase_info.name: Readmill
crunchbase_info.headline: Readmill is an application designed for Android and iOS that enables users to read and share e-books.
crunchbase_info.description: Readmill, a Berlin, Germany-based social and shareable reading platform. Led by CEO Henrik Berggren, Readmill allows users to highlight parts of an ebook, share these highlights with friends and start discussions around them. The company also  announced partnerships with six major independent stores including Leanpub, Readlists, Free-ebooks.net, Jottify, OR Books, Publit, and Bibliocrunch.

linkedin_info.description:
Hey there, we're Readmill - a small, international team working in the heart of Berlin. We've built an ebook reader for iPhone and iPad that lets you read, share and discover great books. We're always on the lookout for talented engineers and designers to come and work with us. 

Check out our openings here: http://readmill.com/jobs
Listen in on what we're saying here: http://blog.readmill.com
Get to know us here: http://instagr.am/readmill
